text: The 1996 Algerian Cup Final was the 32nd final of the Algerian Cup. The final took place on July 5, 1996, at Stade 5 Juillet 1962 in Algiers. MC Oran beat USM Blida 1-0 to win their 4th Algerian Cup. ==Route to the final== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center;margin:0" |- !scope="col" style="width:35px"|Round !scope="col" style="width:175px"|Opposition !scope="col" style="width:70px"|Score |- !scope=row style="text-align:center"|R64 |RC M'zab (N) |6–3 |- !scope=row style="text-align:center"|R32 |CRE Constantine (A) |1–1 (a) (4–2) |- !scope=row style="text-align:center"|R16 |CS Constantine (A) |3–4 (a) |- !scope=row style="text-align:center"|Quarter-finals |ASPC Tlemcen (N) |4–1 |- !scope=row style="text-align:center" rowspan="2"|Semi-final |ES Sétif (N) |4–3 (a) |- | colspan="3" style="background:white;"|Key: (H) = Home venue; (A) = Away venue; (N) = Neutral venue. |} {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center;margin:0" |- !scope="col" style="width:35px"|Round !scope="col" style="width:175px"|Opposition !scope="col" style="width:70px"|Score |- !scope=row style="text-align:center"|R64 |WA Mostaganem (A) |1–3 (a) |- !scope=row style="text-align:center"|R32 |ES Mostaganem (A) |0–2 |- !scope=row style="text-align:center"|R16 |WA Tlemcen (H) |1–0 |- !scope=row style="text- align:center"|Quarter-finals |USM Bel Abbès (N) |3–1 (a) |- !scope=row style="text-align:center" rowspan="2"|Semi-final |HB Chelghoum Laid (N) |2–1 (a) |- | colspan="3" style="background:white;"|Key: (H) = Home venue; (A) = Away venue; (N) = Neutral venue. |} ==Pre-match== ===Details=== {| style="width:92%;" |- | | |} {| style="width:100%" |- |style="vertical-align:top;width:40%"| {| style="font- size:90%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" |- !width=25| !!width=25| |- !width="25"| !!width="25"| !!width="200"| !! |- |GK||1|| Mohamed Hammouche |- |DF||2|| Hocine Hamrouni || || |- |DF||3|| Mohamed Allag |- |DF||4|| Hakim Zane |- |DF||5|| Kamel Zane (c) |- |MF||6|| Billel Harkas |- |MF||7|| Mourad Hamiti |- |MF||8|| Sid Ali Saoudi || || |- |FW||9|| Billal Zouani |- |FW||10|| Redha Zouani |- |FW||11|| Mustapha Chambet || || |- |colspan=3|Substitutes : |- |DF||12|| Abdennour Krebazza || || |- |MF||13|| Mahdjour || || |- |FW||14|| Adel Bourzak || || |- |MF||15|| Merzak Ali-Messaoud|| || |- |GK||16||Mohamed-Chérif Manaâ|| || |- |colspan=3|Manager : |- |colspan=4| Mokhtar Belabed & Ahmed Echouf |} |} {| width=100% style="font-size: 90%" | width=50% valign=top| MATCH OFFICIALS *Assistant referees: ** ** *Fourth official: ** MAN OF THE MATCH * Omar Belatoui (MC Oran) | style="width:50%; vertical-align:top;"| MATCH RULES * 90 minutes. * 30 minutes of extra-time if necessary. * Penalty shootout if scores still level. * Seven named substitutes. * Maximum of three substitutions. |} ==References== Cup Algeria Category:Algerian Cup Finals
